channel.title: My Compiler.bat isn't working right!
channel.description:
Hello, well i have a problem with my compiler.bat.....
Ok when i run my compiler it runs alright and everything, but when i change something in the client.java and run the compiler nothing gets changed on my server, i think it is becaause when i run my compiler is says "cannot find path specified" and i dont know how to fix that problem. i tried like putting the java things in spots and edit it in the compiler but it still doesnt work. And i have the location exactly what it says in my compiler.
I have this in my compiler:
@echo off @color 1f title Server compiler echo Starting YOURSERVERscape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
Thank You, Ldawg11[b][/b]

item.title: My Compiler.bat isn't working right!
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

Try This -

@Echo Off @Color 1F Title Server ComPiler @Echo Starting .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server Pause

[b]Private Message Me If This Doesn’t Work, Or Email Me On JumpOnJava@Hotmail.co.uk

Thanks,

-Jump On Java[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: My Compiler.bat isn't working right!
item.dc:creator: @Ldawg11 Ldawg11
item.description:
@Ldawg11 wrote:

Hello, well i have a problem with my compiler.bat…

Ok when i run my compiler it runs alright and everything, but when i change something in the client.java and run the compiler nothing gets changed on my server, i think it is becaause when i run my compiler is says “cannot find path specified” and i dont know how to fix that problem. i tried like putting the java things in spots and edit it in the compiler but it still doesnt work. And i have the location exactly what it says in my compiler.

I have this in my compiler:

@echo off
@color 1f
title Server compiler
echo Starting YOURSERVERscape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Thank You, Ldawg11

Read full topic
